m: : How do you do it? Be in charge, mercilessly judge people, all that all the time?
's smile falls, and she looks thoughtful.
: To be honest, I don't know how.
I can't even imagine what it must be like, I mean, I can't even have the heart to be an active!
: Not to say I act cluelessly. No no!
taps her cheek in thought.
: -- You figure that, if you're placed in my seat, then it's entirely up to me to decide if people deserve to be lead and dropped in the blink of an eye. Right?
: You're free to say anything that would make the point clearer, Rei dearest.
: But in truth: I don't have a deeper reasoning behind any of my judgement or rule beyond a desire for change.
: I just...I wonder how you have the strength of will to do what you do, that's all. You might say...I'm jealous? I want to find my own strength, my own reason to exist.
: I can't  say there's a solid way to do that, but!
taps her cheek and hums.

: Ever made a bet on the Reapers' Game before?

the screens around Shibuya flicker before blinking out one by one. After a moment of unsettling silence, they kick back to life. The Underground’s skull symbol is displayed on every one of those screens. (( THE GOD’S CHANNEL IS STARTING. ))

Paths halt and dither for sixteen souls
From accidents and misfortunes they cannot control;
And if they squint in the darkness ahead,
Will they find the light? Will they wander instead?
But wander on they shall, until they find
Where the dead dance under stars align.

that, is, halyosy - Window (translated)YouTube · 4:8 · 117K · 99%Credits ---------------------------------------- http://www.nicovideo.jp/watch/sm2721967 Vocals/lyrics/arrangement: that, is, halyosy Music: ヒゲドライバー (Hige Driver) Original title: Window Rearrangement and cover of: Hige Driver - Hello Windows http://www.nicovideo.jp/watch/sm2322242 Notes ---------------------------------------- that, is, and halyosy are pseudonyms for 笹原翔太 (Sasahara Shouta), 中村博 (Nakamura Hiroshi), and 森晴義 (Mori Haruyoshi), respectively. The three are members of a Japanese acoustic band named absorb. "halyosy" comes from "Haruyosi", which is Haruyoshi's name in Kunrei-shiki romaji. Most Japanese people would pronounce "halyosy" identically to his real name. mixi (http://www.mixi.jp/) is a Japanese social networking site along the lines of MySpace or Facebook. Video description translation ---------------------------------------- 8 years ago, I moved to Tokyo and lived by myself for the first time. It was a new atmosphere, and new food, that I wasn't used to. Back then, I was supported by the kindness shown to me by people who didn't know my name or my face. That time and that feeling is what I wrote into a song called "Window." I tried combining it with Hige Driver's amazingly beautiful video!!! Please forgive me for such a presumptuous collaboration... The brand-new rap lyrics were written to match the song!!! * Song and arrangement: that, is, halyosy * Lyrics, etc.: http://www.halyosy.com/
